meanings.definition: A tropical tree or shrub of the genus Cinchona.
meanings.sent1: The cinchona in the garden provides shade with its broad leaves.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the cinchona to learn more about its medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the cinchona branches as a secret hideout.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the forest like the rustling leaves of a cinchona.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red flowers of the cinchona tree brighten up the entire landscape.

meanings.definition: The dried bark of this tree, containing quinine and other alkaloids.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist prepared a tonic using cinchona for its healing properties.
meanings.sent2: People in the past used cinchona to treat fevers and illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added cinchona to the soup, giving it a bitter taste.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of cinchona bark filled the room, reminiscent of ancient remedies.
meanings.sent5: The bitter taste of cinchona lingered on his tongue long after he swallowed it.
